verses.verse: Brethren <S%G80><s%>, my <S%G1699><s%> heart's <S%G2588><s%> desire <S%G2107><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayer <S%G1162><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, that <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1519><s%> they might be saved <S%G4991><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I bear <S%G3140><s%> them <S%G846><s%> record <S%G3140><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> a zeal <S%G2205><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to knowledge <S%G1922><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they being ignorant <S%G50><s%> of God's <S%G2316><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> going about <S%G2212><s%> to establish <S%G2476><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, have <S%G5293><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> submitted themselves <S%G5293><s%> unto the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the end <S%G5056><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> to every one <S%G3956><s%> that believeth <S%G4100><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> describeth <S%G1125><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, That <S%G3754><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> which doeth <S%G4160><s%> those things <S%G846><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which is of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> speaketh <S%G3004><s%> on this wise <S%G3779><s%>, Say <S%G2036><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> shall ascend <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>? (that is <S%G5123><s%>, to bring <S%G2609><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> down <S%G2609><s%> from above:)

Or <S%G2228><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> shall descend <S%G2597><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the deep <S%G12><s%>? (that is <S%G5123><s%>, to bring up <S%G321><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> again <S%G321><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.)

But <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> saith it <S%G3004><s%>? The word <S%G4487><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> nigh <S%G1451><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, even in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>: that is <S%G5123><s%>, the word <S%G4487><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> we preach <S%G2784><s%>;

That <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thou shalt confess <S%G3670><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shalt believe <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, thou shalt be saved <S%G4982><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> with the heart <S%G2588><s%> man believeth <S%G4100><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> with the mouth <S%G4750><s%> confession is made <S%G3670><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> shall <S%G2617><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be ashamed <S%G2617><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> difference <S%G1293><s%> between <S%G5037><s%> the Jew <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Greek <S%G1672><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> over all <S%G3956><s%> is rich <S%G4147><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that call upon <S%G1941><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
For <S%G3956><s%> <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall call upon <S%G1941><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall be saved <S%G4982><s%>.

How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall they call on <S%G1941><s%> him in <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they have <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%>? and <S%G1161><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall they believe in <S%G4100><s%> him of whom <S%G3739><s%> they have <S%G191><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> heard <S%G191><s%>? and <S%G1161><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall they hear <S%G191><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> a preacher <S%G2784><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall they preach <S%G2784><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> they be sent <S%G649><s%>? as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, How <S%G5613><s%> beautiful <S%G5611><s%> are the feet of them <S%G4228><s%> that preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%>, and bring glad tidings <S%G2097><s%> of good things <S%G18><s%>!

But <S%G235><s%> they have <S%G5219><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> obeyed <S%G5219><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> hath believed <S%G4100><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> report <S%G189><s%>?
So then <S%G686><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> cometh by <S%G1537><s%> hearing <S%G189><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> hearing <S%G189><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%>, Have <S%G191><s%> they not <S%G3378><s%> heard <S%G191><s%>? Yes verily <S%G3304><s%>, their <S%G846><s%> sound <S%G5353><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the ends <S%G4009><s%> of the world <S%G3625><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%>, Did <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3378><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> know <S%G1097><s%>? First <S%G4413><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> will provoke <S%G3863><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to jealousy <S%G3863><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> them that are no <S%G3756><s%> people <S%G1484><s%>, and by <S%G1909><s%> a foolish <S%G801><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> I will anger <S%G3949><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%> is very bold <S%G662><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, I was found <S%G2147><s%> of them that sought <S%G2212><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>; I was made <S%G1096><s%> manifest <S%G1717><s%> unto them that asked <S%G1905><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> after <S%G1905><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%>, All <S%G3650><s%> day long <S%G2250><s%> I have stretched forth <S%G1600><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> a disobedient <S%G544><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gainsaying <S%G483><s%> people <S%G2992><s%>.
